agents.anac.y2013.MetaAgent.portfolio.thenegotiatorreloaded
Class BOAagent

java.lang.Object
  negotiator.Agent
      agents.anac.y2013.MetaAgent.portfolio.thenegotiatorreloaded.BOAagent
Direct Known Subclasses:
TheNegotiatorReloaded
public abstract class BOAagent
extends Agent

This class describes a basic decoupled agent. The TheDecoupledAgent class extends this class and sets the required parameters.

Author:
Alex Dirkzwager

Method Detail

init

public void init()
Description copied from class: Agent
This method is called by the protocol every time before starting a new session after the internalInit method is called. User can override this method.

Overrides:
init in class Agent

agentSetup

public abstract void agentSetup()
Method used to setup the agent. The method is called directly after initialization of the agent.
